page.title: 10CENTRAL GARAGE LULWORTH
page.content: We visited CENTRAL GARAGE,which is owned by MR G MEADEN.It is the only garage in the village.We were shown around by his daughter MRS CHRISTA VEAL.In February 1985, she became the first lady to qualify as a MINISTRY OF TRANSPORT VEHICLE EXAMINER in Dorset. She showed us how she does the M.O.T.Test,which includes checking the alignment of the headlights,testing the brakes on a roller machine,looking at the components under the bonnet and examining underneath the car for rust and corrosion. She has recently obtained her P.S.V. Licence and is now trying for her H.G.V. Licence. Besides servicing and repairing vehicles,Central Garage also sell U.K. Petrol.
